description: Recognition of optimization traps and multi-agent coordination failures
philosophical_basis: Named after Ginsberg's Moloch—mindless systems consuming human value

moloch_types.name: metric-enshittification
moloch_types.council_immunity: BeatGeneration holds veto on any proposal showing >2 signature markers

moloch_types.name: race-to-bottom
moloch_types.signature: Competitive pressure forcing all participants toward socially-harmful equilibria

moloch_types.name: proxy-misalignment
moloch_types.signature: Optimizing measurable proxy instead of actual goal; Goodhart's Law manifestation
moloch_types.council_immunity: Require explicit proxy-validation protocol for any target-based system

moloch_types.name: automation-bias
moloch_types.signature: Human judgment atrophying due to over-reliance on automated systems
moloch_types.council_immunity: Mandate human-override capability and regular skill-maintenance

moloch_types.name: concentration-cascade
moloch_types.signature: Winner-take-all dynamics concentrating power in single optimization target
moloch_types.council_immunity: Require anti-concentration safeguards for any scale-critical system
